summary: This bill, the Rural Water System Disaster Preparedness and Assistance Act, amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to establish an emergency preparedness and response technical assistance program. The program provides grants to eligible nonprofit organizations to assist rural water and wastewater systems in preparing for and responding to natural or manmade disasters. Activities include on-site assistance, coordination with emergency networks, disaster plan development, vulnerability assessments, and emergency service restoration. The bill authorizes appropriations of $20 million annually from 2025 to 2029.
